location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Wedderburn, Accountant General in Bombay, from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf

physicalDescription.extent: The letter has been struck through in blue pencil.

mods.abstract: The letter concerns Residency finances. Stannus writes that he has forwarded bills of exchange drawn by him on the Bombay Government, to meet the demands of the Residency.
